title: Cant reinstall after deleting
body: After my league client would not start up I completely deleted League and then tried reinstalling. When I go to the league website to re download I get to the setup box, but the box is completely white and then seconds later it closes out like nothing happened. Can someone help?

replies.body: So I still can't fix this setup wizard problem and I have submitted a request no response yet :/. Can someone help?
how did you fix it I still can't download league

This is definitely pretty strange.  Given that the League client didn't start up previously, it sounds like there may be some sort of OS Permissions issue.  Essentially, League is trying to run, but something is blocking it from doing so.  In order to rule this out as a root cause, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).  Some of the steps there may seem fairly simple, but they are crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

Hit me up again if you are still experiencing any issues!
i tried doing the options to fix it but it still doesn't work, the set up screen is still completely white and it just goes away again.

Since those steps didn't help, we are going to have to dig a lot deeper and review some logs to give us a better idea of your computer configuration.  Make sure to[ submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and one of our Tech Specialists can help out!

Also, make sure to include the following:

1) [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

2) [Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
